title: Tobacco Grater
provenance_text:
Mr. Lehne, Paris, France. Purchased by Mrs. George W. Steele, by December 25, 1924; Herbert DuPuy [1856-1930], Pittsburgh, PA, December 25, 1924 [1]; gift to Department of Fine Arts, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, November 1927. 
NOTES: [1] Herbert DuPuy records this item as having been "Purchased from Mr. Lehne, Paris, and presented by Mrs. George W. Steele on Christmas, 1924." It is unclear if Mrs. Steele gave this to DuPuy as a gift for Christmas, or if it was presented to him in a different context, perhaps with Mrs. Steele operating as an agent?
